Hi,

I'm a newbie to UnitTesting.
I need your advise on how to develop a unit testing on an 
application.

These are my application flow:
- This is a standalone application(no GUI) that connects to a server 
to receive information via callback method.
- The received information will be processed and sent back to the 
same server as a new information
- The server validates the information and returns the confirmation 
whether the information is acceptable.

1)I need to test whether the information I receive is valid
2)I need to test the status sent back by server whenever I send the 
correct or incorrect information to the server.

How am I going to design a testcase?

Hope to get advice.

tx.
